column4: Does anyone know why I have two instances of smb.conf, one in /etc/samba and the other in /usr/share/samba?
/usr/share/samba is what the samba package isntalls as an example pretty much the system only looks at the one in /etc/samba/
Thank you, that was what I meant to ask, which one matters :)
that wasn't Sergo-Ubuntu that told you that that was me :)_
